title: Get a New Wallet
page-footer-title: Want to learn more about Blockchain or MEW? Please go to {faq}

welcome.title: Welcome to MEW
welcome.desc: Please take a moment to read through this short introduction. It’s very important for your own security that you understand these warnings. Ignoring this step will highly increase the chances of your funds being lost or stolen, in which case we won’t be able to help you. {skip} at your own risk.

mewconnect.title: Recommended Method
mewconnect.desc: Safe and easy access to your wallet in 3 steps.

password.do-not-forget-save-pw: {do-not-forget} to save your password. You will need this {key-pass} File to unlock your wallet.

keystore.message-wait: Please wait while we generate your keystore file...

loose.title: Don't Lose It
loose.desc: Be careful, it can not be recovered if you lose it.

share.title: Don't Share It
share.desc: Your funds will be stolen if you use this file on a malicious phishing site.

backup.title: Make a Backup
backup.desc: Secure it like the millions of dollars it may one day be worth.

mnemonic.title: Your Mnemonic Phrase
mnemonic.popover: A mnemonic phrase is a list of 12 - 24 words that can be used to access your wallet.
mnemonic.button-wrote-it-down: I Wrote Down My Mnemonic Phrase
mnemonic.do-not-forget-save-mnemonic: {do-not-forget} to save your mnemonic phrase. You will need this to access your wallet.

warning.extra-word: If you choose to include an extra word, understand you will ALWAYS need this extra word with your mnemonic phrase. You can not change it. It becomes a permanent part of your phrase.

verify.title: Verification
verify.text: Please enter and fill out the empty boxes below to verify your mnemonic phrase key

table.title: Mnemonic Phrase
table.safe-place: Please Keep This Sheet at a Very Safe Place. It is your property!
table.cannot-change-pw: We {cannot} change your password. Please {do-not-forget} to save your password, and it is your private key. You will need this {password} to access your wallet

created.title: Success
created.text: Your have created your wallet successfully.
